meanings.sent1: Her hutzpahs in asking for a raise impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: It takes a lot of hutzpahs to speak up in front of a large audience.
meanings.sent3: His hutzpahs in challenging the champion made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The little bird showed hutzpahs by standing up to the big cat.
meanings.sent5: The explorer's hutzpahs led him to discover new lands.

meanings.sent1: She had the hutzpahs to ask for a refund even after using the product.
meanings.sent2: The politician's hutzpahs were evident in his controversial statements.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel showed hutzpahs by stealing nuts from the picnic.
meanings.sent4: His hutzpahs in negotiating the deal surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The student's hutzpahs in challenging the teacher's decision paid off.

meanings.sent1: The child had the hutzpahs to ask for more dessert before finishing dinner.
meanings.sent2: His hutzpahs in flirting with the boss's daughter got him in trouble.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed hutzpahs by stealing the dog's bed.
meanings.sent4: Her hutzpahs in wearing pajamas to the fancy party raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The comedian's hutzpahs in making fun of the audience backfired.
